Title: Lead Full Stack Developer
Location: Level 3, 89-91-93 Nguyen Co Thach street, An Khanh ward, Ho Chi Minh city, Viet Nam, 89-91-93 Nguyễn Cơ Thạch, An Lợi Đông, Quận 2, Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam
Job Description:
Responsibilities:

Lead the development team (Backend and Frontend developers), managing task allocation across 3-4 simultaneous projects.
Actively participate in the full stack development, including:
Backend: Java (Spring Boot), PostgreSQL
Frontend: React with TypeScript
Conduct regular code reviews, ensuring code quality, consistency, and adherence to best practices.
Serve as the primary technical liaison between the offshore team and the onshore team, maintaining clear and effective communication.
Proactively identify technical issues, provide solutions, and mitigate project risks.
Provide mentorship and support team skill growth.
Maintain technical documentation and ensure clarity in project deliverables.
Job Requirements:
Requirements:

5+ years of experience as a Full Stack Developer.
Strong expertise in Java Spring Boot, PostgreSQL, React, and TypeScript.
Previous experience leading or mentoring technical teams preferred.
Familiarity or experience with React Native is a plus.
Fluent in English with excellent communication and organizational skills.
Comfortable working remotely and effectively managing distributed teams.
Field: Kỹ thuật xây dựng/Cơ sở hạ tầng
Keyword: Công Nghệ Thông Tin/Viễn Thông, Phần Mềm Máy Tính, Kỹ thuật xây dựng/Cơ sở hạ tầng, Java, ReactJS, Leadership, PostgreSQL, TypeScript, Công Ty TNHH Nexgenus, Hồ Chí Minh

Title: BD Executive/Sales Executive
Location: EverGrow - Sky Gate Building - 36-38 Nguyễn Văn Trỗi, 38 Đường Nguyễn Văn Trỗi, phường 15, Phú Nhuận, Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam, 25 Phố Lý Thường Kiệt, Phan Chu Trinh, Hoàn Kiếm, Hà Nội, Việt Nam, 4/F, E-town 1 Building, 364 Cong Hoa St., Ward 13, Tan Binh Dist., HCMC
Job Description:
Tasks – Activities – Responsibilities
• Be responsible for the sales related to the client at BV's departments (Certification, ,
Building & Infrastructure, depends on the candidate's ability)
• Identify, develop, and follow-up on new sales leads and prospects.
• Conduct telesales to approach into enterprises community to finalize potential
customers.
• Define potential customers and conduct sales meetings.
• Collect all accurate information of customers and issue quoting/ contract.
• Prepare contract review when needed.
• Ensure the target of a number of visits of new prospects.
• Achieve the target fixed by Line Manager.
• Follow up with customers.
• Manage and follow up sales database.
• Build, strengthen and optimize relationships with clients, prospects, and partners.
• Support preparing any tender, specific tasks will be assigned by the Line Manager
case by case.
• Maintain good relationships with current customers who are assigned by the line
manager.
• Co-ordinate with operations departments when receiving any requirement from
customers
• Follow strictly customer complaint process.
Job Requirements:
• Bachelor’s Degree or Higher level.
• Proficiency in English (compulsory) and preferable candidates who can speak 3rd language such as Chinese, Japanese or Korean;
• At least 2-3 years of sales experience B2B...
• Can work independently under pressure.
• Good communication and presentation skills, teamwork spirit.
• Can arrange to travel for the client visit.
• Good command of office software (Outlook, Word, Excel, Power Point, …).
Field: Kỹ thuật xây dựng/Cơ sở hạ tầng
Skills: Communication Skills, English Language Proficiency, Office Software, Sales Experience, Teamwork
Keyword: Kinh Doanh, Bán Hàng/Phát Triển Kinh Doanh, Kỹ thuật xây dựng/Cơ sở hạ tầng, Communication Skills, English Language Proficiency, Office Software, Sales Experience, Teamwork, Bureau Veritas Vietnam Ltd., Hồ Chí Minh, Hà Nội
